title: The Adventure Zone: Amnesty - Episode 21
description: A new threat to Kepler, West Virginia makes itself known — both to the Pine Guard, and to a group less patient with its wanton destruction. Duck plays detective. Aubrey does some counseling. Ned gets seen.
author: shows@themcelroy.family (The McElroys)
